description.x-y:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.

If the target is electrified before it uses a move
during that turn, the target’s move becomes
Electric type.

Electric type.

description.sword-shield:
If the target is electrified before it uses a move
during that turn, the target’s move becomes
Electric type.

effect.full: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
effect.shortEffect: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
